text: Peter Felser (born 20 September 1969) is a German politician for the populist Alternative for Germany (AfD) and since 2017 member of the Bundestag. ==Life and politics== Felser was born 1969 in the Bavarian town Dillingen an der Donau and studied at the Bundeswehr University Munich. Felser entered the AfD in 2015 and became after the 2017 German federal election member of the bundestag. Felser denies the scientific consensus on climate change. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Alternative for Germany politicians Category:Members of the Bundestag 2017–2021 Category:Members of the Bundestag for the Alternative for Germany Category:People from Dillingen an der Donau
title: Peter Felser
